entry.tran: 食欲缺乏的;厌食的;瘦骨嶙峋的
entry.def: If someone is anorexic, they are suffering from anorexia and so are very thin.

example.ex: Claire had been anorexic for three years.
example.tran: 克莱尔曾经遭受厌食症3年的折磨。

means.word_mean: 1. a person suffering from anorexia nervosa
1. suffering from anorexia nervosa; pathologically thin
